data.message: Deposit scheme, please, or I stop drinking coke.

replies.message: Hi Penny, We don’t want to see any of our packaging end up where it shouldn’t. We are in the process of review our sustainable packaging strategy and will share more details later in the year. As part of this process we’ve been speaking to experts in this area and we believe the time is right to trial a well-designed deposit return scheme in Scotland  to understand the role it could play in increasing recycling rates and reducing litter. More here: http://spr.ly/61858n6iJ
